channel.title: PhD Student on Gioele La Manno
channel.description: Recent content in PhD Student on Gioele La Manno

item.title: Lada Polyakova
item.description: Blurb I am a PhD student in the Computational and Quantitative Biology Program (EDCB) at EPFL, working in the La Manno Lab.

item.title: Laura Lape√±a Gil
item.description: Blurb I am a PhD student in the Neuroscience Program (EDNE) at EPFL, working in the La Manno Lab.

item.title: Alireza Gargoorimothlag
item.description: Blurb I am a PhD student in the Neuroscience Program (EDNE) at EPFL, working in the La Manno Lab on computational approaches for understanding brain development.

item.title: Morgane Storey
item.description: Blurb I am a joint PhD student in the Neuroscience Program (EDNE) between the La Manno Lab and Prof. Petersen’s lab at EPFL.

item.title: Xinyi Huang
item.description: Blurb I am a PhD student in the Biotechnology and Bioengineering Program (EDBB) at EPFL, working in the La Manno Lab.

item.title: Rosan Hans
item.description: Blurb I am an Industrial PhD student in the Biotechnology and Bioengineering Program (EDBB) at EPFL, working jointly with the La Manno Lab and Roche IHB, supervised by Dr. Giuliana Rossi.
